meanings.definition: A person who spreads fear or alarm
meanings.sent1: The fearmongers in the movie made everyone scared.
meanings.sent2: The fearmongers on social media are causing panic.
meanings.sent3: The fearmongers at the haunted house were just actors trying to scare people.
meanings.sent4: The fearmongers in the dark alley seemed to multiply like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The fearmongers in the story were depicted as sinister figures lurking in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: She fearmongers about the dangers of the forest to keep people away.
meanings.sent2: The politician fearmongers to gain support for stricter laws.
meanings.sent3: He fearmongers about monsters under the bed to tease his little sister.
meanings.sent4: The storm fearmongers the animals into seeking shelter.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds fearmongers the townspeople into preparing for a storm.
